rules.name: catSpawnChance
rules.description: Sets chance cat will spawn in a village
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 100

rules.name: commandToggleSpectator
rules.description: Enables /ts command to toggle spectator mode
extras: Requires returnSpectators to be set to true.
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

rules.name: noPiglinGuarding
rules.description: Prevent piglin aggro when breaking or interacting with a piglin-guarded block

rules.name: returnSpectators
rules.description: Stores player position when switching to spectator and returns them to it when switching back to survival

rules.name: sharedVillagerDiscounts
rules.description: Shares major positive reputation amongst all players

rules.name: visibleSpectators
rules.description: Makes spectators visible to non-spectator players
